event.title: Ramon Hnatyshyn sworn in as Governor General
African National Congress leader Nelson Mandela freed from South African prison
Canada Constitution: Meech Lake Accord dies
Oka crisis begins in Quebec
Iraq invades Kuwait
Oka crisis: Attack on Kahnawake elders, women and children on Mercier Bridge
Oka crisis ends with peaceful surrender
Gulf War begins
Canada's first woman Premier, Rita Johnson
Former Governor General Roland Michener dies
Riots erupt in Los Angeles after officers acquitted in Rodney King beating
Westray Coal Mine explosion in Plymouth, NS
Rowers McBean and Heddle win double gold at the Olympic summer games in Barcelona
Charlottetown Accord
Toronto Blue Jays win their first World Series
Canadian referendum rejects Charlottetown Accord
Former Governor General Jeanne Sauve dies
Brian Mulroney out of Prime Minister's office
Kim Campbell sworn in as Canada's first female Prime Minister
35th general federal election
Kim Campbell out of Prime Minister's office
Jean Chretien sworn in as Prime Minister
NAFTA implemented between Canada, U.S. and Mexico
Bedard and Brassard win gold at Lillehammer Winter Olympics
Nelson Mandela elected President of South Africa
Second Parti Quebecois government elected in Quebec
Romeo LeBlanc announced Governor General
Guy Paul Morin acquitted of Christine Jessop murder based on DNA evidence
Romeo LeBlanc sworn in as Governor General
OJ Simpson acquitted in murder trial
Quebec separatism: Second referendum in Quebec rejects independence by 1% margin
Toronto Raptors first NBA game (in Toronto)
Vancouver Grizzlies first NBA game (in Portland)
Donovan Bailey world record and Olympic gold in 100 metres
Red River flooding begins
Bre-X gold scandal hits the news
Red River flooding ends
36th general federal election
Diana, Princess of Wales dies in Paris car accident
Diana, Princess of Wales buried
Racecar driver Jacques Villeneuve wins Formula championship
1998 Ice Storm begins
1998 Ice Storm ends
NATO forces attack Yugoslavia in response to Kosovo attacks
Nunavut becomes territory
Hockey great Wayne Gretzky retires
Romeo LeBlanc out of Governor General's office
Adrienne Clarkson sworn in as Governor General
